properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 260259Z MAY
   BY M/V POLAR EXPLORER TOWING 12 CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-48.63S 039-29.83W, 23-14.17S 038-54.85W,
   27-06.50S 042-05.42W, 26-33.72S 042-39.65W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 260359Z MAY.
